categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Greck  was a Sith Acolyte of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War. Trained in the Sith Academy on Korriban, as part of his final trial Greck was sent by Overseer Harkun into the Valley of the Dark Lords to retrieve the helm of Tulak Hord along with a group of other acolytes, which included Bensyn, Kagan and Lana Beniko. Upon entering the Tomb of Tulak Hord the group was overwhelmed by k'lor'slugs, which left Greck dead and Kagan severely wounded.
